ProductInfo.Features:
Marine night vision device is capable of spotting a small vessel up to 4,940 feet away, or a person in the water from 1,800 feet
Durable and lightweight; waterproof to an IP67 submersible rating, and floats when dropped in the water for easy recovery
240x180 VOx microbolometer detector, 24-by-18-degree NTSC field of view, 19-millimeter focal length, 7.5-13.5 um waveband, and FLIR proprietary Digital Detail Enhancement image processing
Comes complete with thermal camera, hot shoe charging and video output accessory, four rechargeable AA batteries, AC power adapter/charger, neck lanyard, manual, USB cable, and video output cable
Includes limited two-year manufacturer's warranty
ProductInfo.Name: FLIR First Mate HM-224 PRO Handheld Maritime Thermal Night Vision Camera, Black/Yellow
